app.name: ImageInsight
app.description: Ogaaw goorta iyo halka sawirradaada laga qaatay, qalabka loo isticmaalay, iyo wax badan oo kale oo ah qalab awood leh oo sawir-falanqayn ah.

upload.title: Soo gelinta Fudud
upload.description: Jiid oo dhig ama guji si aad u soo geliso sawirradaada

privacy.title: Asturnaanta Koowaad
privacy.description: Sawirradaada waxaa lagu badhitaaraa si maxalli ah

dropzone.title: Ku rid sawirkaaga halkan ama guji si aad u soo geliso
dropzone.subtitle: Waxaa la taageeraa: JPG, PNG, HEIC
dropzone.change: Guji ama jiid si aad u bedesho sawirka

analysis.error: Waa lagu guuldaraystay inaan la akhriyo xogta

metadata.modified: Markii ugu Dambeysay ee la Bedelay

footer.description: Ka hel faahfaahinta qarsoon ee sawirradaada adoo isticmaalaya qalab awood leh oo xog-falanqayn ah. Asturnaanta ayaa mudnaanta leh, waa degdeg, waana fudud yahay in la isticmaalo.
